actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 3, sections 202 and 203 of title 3, United States Code, to enhance the security of the White House through the expansion of the United States Secret Service, Uniformed Division security perimeter to include the Treasury Building and grounds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the United States Secret Service Uniformed Division to provide protection of the Treasury Building and grounds.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 3, sections 202 and 203 of title 3, United States Code, to enhance the security of the White House through the expansion of the United States Secret Service, Uniformed Division security perimeter to include the Treasury Building and grounds, and for other purposes.
